missionProperties.startingObjective: Find and destroy the control terminals (&Terminals&/2).
missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Place 1 neutral mission token on each green highlighted square. These are explosives. A figure can carry up to 2 explosives. 
{-} A hero can spend 2 movement points to retrieve an explosive without spending an action. Then, that hero may test {K}. If successful, that hero gains 1 movement point.
{-} A hero may spend 2 movement points and discard an explosive he is carrying to choose a space up to 2 spaces away and roll a red die. Each figure and object on or adjacent to the chosen space suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.
{-} Doors are locked. They cannot be attacked, but can suffer {H} (Health: 4).
{-} The Rebels win when all control terminals are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

changeRepositionOverride.theText: Block access to explosives, terminals, and doors.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate1
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Drokkatta's face stiffens as the slave camp comes into view. The wookiee points down at stockpiles of controlled explosives used for the camp's mining exploits and growls, indicating the plan. If you can find the central systems of the camp, you can trigger a devastating chain reaction.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked. They cannot be attacked, but can suffer {H} (Health: 4).
{-} The Rebels win when all control terminals are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Place 1 neutral mission token on each green highlighted square. These are explosives. A figure can carry up to 2 explosives. 
{-} A hero can spend 2 movement points to retrieve an explosive without spending an action. Then, that hero may test {K}. If successful, that hero gains 1 movement point.
{-} A hero may spend 2 movement points and discard an explosive he is carrying to choose a space up to 2 spaces away and roll a red die. Each figure and object on or adjacent to the chosen space suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Drokkatta bellows in triumph as the slave camp burns around you and its guards and officers flee in terror. You reach the location where the slaves are held, open the cell doors, and the reunited wookiees embrace.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Drokkatta receives the "Wookiee Roar" Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The despondent howls of the Wookiee slaves fill the air as you make your narrow escape. Flying overhead, you see them reaching toward the sky as if grasping at their departing freedom.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Well Guarded
globalEvents.eventText: As the smoke over the door rubble clears, you see an intimidating sight: A portable cannon, manned by a Scout Trooper, is aiming right at you.

entityProperties.name: Guard Post Door
entityProperties.theText:
The door to the Guard Post is locked tight.

{-} The door cannot be attacked, but can suffer {H} (Health: 4).

entityProperties.name: Bonus Explosive 1
entityProperties.theText: Place an explosive here.

eventActions.theText:
More charges lie on some shelves.

{-} Place an explosive on the highlighted space.

globalEvents.name: Break Time is Over
globalEvents.eventText:
The door is torn open by the blast, leaving a jagged hole in the wall. In the mess hall behind, enemies are jumping up from their seats and draw their weapons. More explosives lie in a corner.

{-} Place an explosive on each of the highlighted spaces.

entityProperties.name: Mess Hall Door
entityProperties.theText:
The door to the Mess Hall is locked tight.

{-} The door cannot be attacked, but can suffer {H} (Health: 4).

entityProperties.name: Bonus Explosive 2-3
entityProperties.theText: Place an explosive on each space here.

globalEvents.name: Strike at the Heart
globalEvents.eventText: There it is â€“ the control center. The terminals hum softly in the twilight. More enemies storm forward to stop you.

entityProperties.name: Control Center Door
entityProperties.theText:
The door to the Control Center is locked tight.

{-} The door cannot be attacked, but can suffer {H} (Health: 4).

entityProperties.name: Bonus Explosive 4
entityProperties.theText: Place an explosive on each space here.

eventActions.theText:
More charges lie on some shelves.

{-} Place an explosive on the highlighted space.

globalEvents.name: Terminal 1 Destroyed
globalEvents.eventText: The terminal vanishes with a loud boom.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The control terminal contains all the data necessary for the slaver's operation.

{-} The terminal cannot be attacked, but can suffer {H} (Health: 3).

globalEvents.name: Terminal 2 Destroyed
globalEvents.eventText: The terminal vanishes with a loud boom.
